surname Lou/one of the 28 lunar mansions in Chinese astronomy
building (a relatively large, multi-storey one)/CL:幢[zhuang4],座[zuo4]

sentences.english: I prefer some sort of oversizedr level. preferstomair-conhly the twentieth floor or higher.
sentences.chinese: 我嗜好較高層的，最好是二十樓或以上。

sentences.english: Office in Huainan City, Chaoyang Road, Ruijin Building, 23rd Floor.
sentences.chinese: 辦公於淮南市朝陽路瑞金大廈23樓。

sentences.english: It felt like falling headfirst off the top of a 2, 000-foot-tall building.
sentences.chinese: 我的感覺就像是頭朝下跳下了兩千英尺高的樓。

sentences.english: We are going to build a building here.
sentences.chinese: 我們打算在這裏建一座樓。

sentences.english: North and south, directly go to photography floor to find m blue, just small stone.
sentences.chinese: 南北直接去攝影樓找米藍了，剛好碰到小石頭。

sentences.english: Fortune Plaza, Building C, 10th Floor, No. 6 Dayelu, Jinjiang District, Chengdu.
sentences.chinese: 成都市，錦江區大業路6號，財富中心C樓10層。

sentences.english: It is the oldest building in our college.
sentences.chinese: 這是我們學院最舊的樓。

sentences.english: This is the building whose windows were all painted green.
sentences.chinese: 這就是窗戶都漆成綠色的那幢樓。

sentences.english: He stumbled down the stairs like a madman.
sentences.chinese: 他像狂人般地跌跌撞撞地走下了樓。

sentences.english: Called Dreaming Roma B&B, it was a 4-roomed apartment.
sentences.chinese: 其實是一個樓裏的有4間屋子的公寓。

sentences.english: so you can't build really high or the buildings will just sink into the ground.
sentences.chinese: 所以你不能把樓建得很高，否則建築物會下沉到地裏。

sentences.english: The story about the six-storeyed dormitory tells a glorious history.
sentences.chinese: 關於六層樓宿舍的故事講述一段光榮歷史。

sentences.english: The building was rocking about because of the earthquake.
sentences.chinese: 由於地震，這幢樓在搖晃。

sentences.english: The ship is designed to have continuous main deck, forecastle and poop.
sentences.chinese: 設計有一連續的主甲板和艏樓，艉樓。

sentences.english: The ship is designed to have continuous main deck, forecastle and poop.
sentences.chinese: 設計有一連續的主甲板和艏樓，艉樓。

sentences.english: The soldiers guarded the only access to the building.
sentences.chinese: 士兵把守着通向那棟樓的唯一通道。

definition: original poster (in an online forum)/landlord of a building (traditional)
upstairs/(Internet slang) previous poster in a forum thread
to form/to organize/group/team/classifier for sets, series, groups of people, batteries
still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
should/ought to/probably/must be/to deserve/to owe/to be sb's turn to do sth/that/the above-mentioned
